page.title: 10SCHOOL MEALS
page.content: Richard's day continues with dinner at school...My favourite is{liver peas {and potatoes}with a{steamed pudding {and custard.} After lunch we play in the playground or on the school field until afternoon class begins at 12.55. We have{P.E.}with ropes to climb,beams to hang from,ladders to swing under and things like that.Then we return to the classroom for other subjects such as{art}and{science.}School finishes at 3.30. When I get home I play on my{B.M.X.} bike with my friend Michael.At 5.30 I have my tea and I stay in and watch{ {T.V.}until about 10.30.Then I go to bed.
